ygData.subject: Re: General advice for soloing
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as kiting goes-- Druids are the masters. Sow, snare, DOTs, root and you can bring almost anything down (that doesn t resist). BUT-- don t forget that we
ygData.messageBody:
As far as kiting goes-- Druids are the masters.
Sow, snare, DOTs, root and you can bring almost
anything down (that doesn't resist). BUT-- don't forget
that we can also fear kite, though only on animals--
this is VERY profitable in Everfrost against Mammoths.
AND we can charm animals too, so we can have helpful
pets for our kiting. <br><br>Who else can quad kite, i
ask you?? <br><br>Xela<br><br>P.S.-- Gods are not
mere mortals!!! They are the GODS!!! It just so
happens that, through magiks and divine interventions,
some chosen members can become heroes and even
powerful godlings themsleves!!! (/ooc over level 50)
